cause.description:
www.ccff.ca
Providing information and links to ways to help the cause
1. A cure is close at hand
2. Promising new therapies on the horizon
3. Children ( 1 in every 3600 Canadians) should not have to suffer with this illness, 1 in every 25 Canadians is a carrier of the gene
cause.mission: Raise awareness and money for research
cause.name: Canadian Cystic Fibrosis Foundation
